overview:
Peter Tahmin is a long-time digital imaging and retailing executive.

He is currently executive vice president and advisory board member for MailPix.com. He is also an advisory board member of Powsumer Inc.

He joined Ritz Camera and Image as Vice President of RitzPix.com and Online Retail in October 2010. Prior to this, Tahmin was at Ritz Interactive Inc. as Senior Vice Pesident and Chief Operating Officer and a founding member of Ritz Interactive Inc. Responsibilities included IT, Customer Service and Distribution and Fulfillment.

Prior to joining Ritz Interactive Inc., he held the position of Director of Digital Services Integration for Eastman Kodak’s Qualex Division, responsible for the introduction of Kodak’s Picture CD, Picture Disk and the joint Kodak/America On Line program called You’ve Got Pictures! During my stay at Qualex, he designed, developed and launched www.Kodaklabs.com, Eastman Kodak’s first on line digital imaging Internet service.
